projects.name: VicCrash Viewer
projects.about: Team based project with the goal of creating an interactive user interface to visualise and search a large excel based datafile. Includes a user manual and useable on Windows and Linux.

projects.name: Sneaky Chats
projects.about: Solo project with the goal of creating a real time, multiple room chat application with varying levels of user permissions. Images and chat history are supported per invidual room.

projects.name: HabITech Builder
projects.about: Team based project for a real world client, creating an framework builder for co-design. Using the original Word Document form the client provided to us, we have converted this form into a web based tool with version control that is modular and able to be exported as a PDF.
